formalpara.title: Figure 7. Hermaphrodite and male H, V and T lineages.
formalpara.para: Development of the lateral hypodermis. Divisions are anterior-posterior unless otherwise indicated. g, neuron or glial cell; se, seam; set, tail seam; sy, syncytial. Reprinted from Sulston, J. E., and Horvitz, H. R. (1977), Copyright (1977), with permission from Elsevier. Control-click or right-click to see larger image.
